augmented_topic: Hobbies and Free Time (Science Fiction Theme)
objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Science Fiction lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about hobbies and free time using slang register
Students create original scifi themed content about hobbies and free time in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using slang register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in slang register within scifi theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with technology
hobbies and free time with innovation
hobbies and free time with futuristic

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
